query.statement:
SELECT A.MENU_DATE, (F.CODE_NAME || G.CODE_NAME) AS MENU_DESC, SUM(ROUND((E.CAL * (D.NEED_QTY*((100-E.DISUSE_RATE)/100)) / 100),2)) CAL, -- "열량" SUM(ROUND((E.NA * (D.NEED_QTY*((100-E.DISUSE_RATE)/100)) / 100),2)) NA, -- "나트륨" SUM(ROUND((E.CARBO * (D.NEED_QTY*((100-E.DISUSE_RATE)/100)) / 100),2)) CARBO, --"당질" SUM(ROUND((E.PROT * (D.NEED_QTY*((100-E.DISUSE_RATE)/100)) / 100),2)) PROT, --"단백질" SUM(ROUND((E.FAT * (D.NEED_QTY*((100-E.DISUSE_RATE)/100)) / 100),2)) FAT, --"지질" SUM(ROUND((E.VITA_A * (D.NEED_QTY*((100-E.DISUSE_RATE)/100)) / 100),2)) VITA_A, --"비타민A" SUM(ROUND((E.THIA * (D.NEED_QTY*((100-E.DISUSE_RATE)/100)) / 100),2)) THIA, --"비타민B1" SUM(ROUND((E.RIBO * (D.NEED_QTY*((100-E.DISUSE_RATE)/100)) / 100),2)) RIBO, --"비타민B2" SUM(ROUND((E.VITA_C * (D.NEED_QTY*((100-E.DISUSE_RATE)/100)) / 100),2)) VITA_C, --"비타민C" SUM(ROUND((E.CA * (D.NEED_QTY*((100-E.DISUSE_RATE)/100)) / 100),2)) CA, --"칼슘" SUM(ROUND((E.FE * (D.NEED_QTY*((100-E.DISUSE_RATE)/100)) / 100),2)) FE --"철" FROM FSM_TERM_MENU_MST A, FSM_TERM_MENU_RECIPE B, FSR_STD_RECIPE_MST C, FSR_STD_RECIPE_ITEM D, FSI_ITEM_NUT E, (SELECT CODE, CODE_NAME FROM SCC_COMMON_CODE WHERE GROUP_CODE = 'FS0023') F, (SELECT CODE, CODE_NAME FROM SCC_COMMON_CODE WHERE GROUP_CODE = 'FS0022') G WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.MEAL = #MEAL#
AND A.CORNER = #CORNER#
AND A.MENU_TYPE = #MENU_TYPE# AND A.MENU_DATE BETWEEN #FROM_MENU_DATE# AND #TO_MENU_DATE# AND A.TERM_MENU_CD = B.TERM_MENU_CD AND B.RECIPE_CD = C.RECIPE_CD AND C.RECIPE_CD = D.RECIPE_CD AND D.ITEM_CODE = E.ITEM_CODE AND A.MEAL = F.CODE(+) AND A.CORNER = G.CODE(+) GROUP BY A.MENU_DATE, F.CODE_NAME, G.CODE_NAME
